game.name: NUMANUIN
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: NUMANUIN - Incredible indie horror, a deconstruction of the horror genre. Seemingly simple, but saturated inside action dark 2d survival-horror in the style of pixels and with roguelite elements
game.shortDescriptionEn: NUMANUIN - Incredible indie horror, a deconstruction of the horror genre. Seemingly simple, but saturated inside action dark 2d survival-horror in the style of pixels and with roguelite elements
